website_summaries.verdict: The Razer Kraken Pro gaming headset offers both comfort and sound quality, and is incredibly simple to set up.

customer_reviews.title: Great Build Quality
customer_reviews.text: very sturdy headset with great noise control Razer is a reputable brand so your safe going with this headset
customer_reviews.author: The Tech Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Gaming Headset
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound quality! When gaming with the kraken you can really feel the bass of explosions! Brilliant for CSGO! The mic, from what I've heard, sounds crisp and clear. The volume on the headset is plenty loud enough. I play on 50% on the headset and I still have to turn game sound down. Overall a well worth purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jack Steed

customer_reviews.title: Microphone Peaks a lot but otherwise perfect.
customer_reviews.text: They sound amazing, very comfortable and extremely durable, cable is just right length and used frequently with no issues. However, if at extremely low volume audio only comes from one speaker but that is just the volume control, turn up slightly and its fine, so manually adjust Via system your using. Also feedback from Friends tells me that the mic 'peaks' a lot with use, maybe its just my loud voice but had to give 4* due to this.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for gamers and music lovers alike!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Looks smart - Sound quality is amazing - Comfortable to wear for extended periods of time - Cord is long enough if you're close to your computer - Microphone is very clear - Cancels surround sound very well Cons: - Cord is only good for working at your desk - The software can sometimes be a big problem. On occasion I have invisible bugs whereby Razer Synapse won't register the device properly so I can't adjust sound. A couple of times the headset randomly goes to FULL volume without warning deafening me for a short period.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Little

customer_reviews.title: I have become one with the cult!
customer_reviews.text: this is the first Razer product i have ever purchased (definitely will not be the last) and it is superior to any headset that i have had and used over the years, the sound quality is crystal clear, the headphone cushions fight perfectly over my (dumbo) ears the customisation options when it comes to the chroma lighting settings is almost godlike )16.8 million options now thats something to brag about!) the only problem i have is that it doesn't come with some sort of adapter so i can plug it into the 3.5mm jack on the playstation 4 controller when i am on the console other than that...Razer you have gained yourself a new cult member!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan smith

customer_reviews.title: Great headset  and clear mic! and it can change colour! what else do you need!
customer_reviews.text: unreal surround sound, gonna take some gettting used to! mic doesnt work with my current usb extention so had to but a gold plated one, the same as the headset comes with, minor problem that i would probly have known if i read the description right. great sound and mic works prefectly now. i forgot to unplug the headset and was listening to music with the volume full, it shounded like i was playing it from my soundbar it was so loud, i only realised when i when to plug them in and use it that it was already plugged in
customer_reviews.author: Oran Mc Gill

customer_reviews.title: Good for thr price
customer_reviews.text: Comfort 8/10 Sound 7/10 (slight buzzing on low volume) Software 9/10 (very easy to use) Mic 7/10 (for a headset its decent not had any issues or complaints about clarity) Build quality 8/10 dropped it a few times but its held up well. Looks 9/10 lights with different modes and a nice looking design Overall review 8/10 if it didnt have a buzzing sound on low volume would be better other then thaf its a nice headset
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: The headset has excellent bass response and the mic is reasonably good
customer_reviews.text: A very robust headset from Razer. This headset is quite comfy but it is a little on the weighty side so after several hours of use it can start to hurt your head. The headset has excellent bass response and the mic is reasonably good. I personally use a stand alone mic to allow for more control over it. The headset is made from reasonably good material and has a lot of give on how far it can bend.
customer_reviews.author: Reuben

customer_reviews.title: great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Comfy, great sound quality. Lasted me 10 and a half months so far without a single issue. If I had a complaint it would be that the wire gets tangled but I have never had a pair of headphones that this wasn't true for. Work great for games or just for music and video. They're comfortable enough to wear for hours at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan M.

customer_reviews.title: In the end they turned out to be overpriced garbage; they're not very durable at all
customer_reviews.text: I deeply regret purchasing this headset. They're refusing to refund me or give a replacement even though I have a valid warranty on Razer Synapse. In the end they turned out to be overpriced garbage; they're not very durable at all. I strongly recommend taking a look at other headsets before looking at this one. Only get this this as a last resort.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Really good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Really good sound quality. Out of the box, the headset has really deep bass. The microphone has really good sound quality, perfect for skype and discord etc. I also like that a mute button has been placed just at the end of the microphone so that it is accessed easily. Surround sound is perfect for hearing footsteps and gunshots in the distance in games.Overall well worth the money.

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is good to the point where the rest of the world ...
customer_reviews.text: Heavy and hot are two words I would use to describe this item. Sound quality is good to the point where the rest of the world goes away which is what I want in a gaming headset. The best feature is without doubt the length of the cord which stretches nearly 2 m across my room.
customer_reviews.author: David Brannigan

customer_reviews.title: very pleased
customer_reviews.text: excellent sound quality and stops house sounding like a war zone it can be uncomfertable during long us and would be impossible to use for hours at a time but i wouldnt be without. These give the best sound quality i have tried and although long use they can be uncomfertable they are still the most comfertable i have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. S. D. Greenslade

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sound but uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband. They are an excellent headset for gaming once you have set up the EQ. I personally found I had to turn off the bass boost. They appear to be rather tight and in fact my husband gave them to me as the material used on the drums, like a pvc, made his ears sore after only 10 mins of use. I have given 3 stars only because of the uncomfortable fit. The sound is excellent once set up to your personal preference, There are youtube videos of gamers settings etc.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Use it as a backup, not primary
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't recommend it as a primary headset because its not very comfortable and the sound quality is average. If you're an audiophile you'll know what I mean, it won't suit you but for most people it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound and quality earphones
customer_reviews.text: I just got these headphone today I have been wanting, a pair of these for ages as well as the blackwidow keyboard the firefly mouse mat and a compatible chroma mouse to complete my set the dog d quality is almost excellent and even good in calls and communication I had Spotify playing as well as calling my friend he didnt have a clue music was playing as well I will be completing my set that is to the quality of these head phones I will take a recap in a few months time. The synapse programme was also very user friendly fly and simple to get around I like the adjustable surround calibration:)
customer_reviews.author: Joshwatt98

customer_reviews.title: The headset is absolutely great, the headset is comfortable to wear and the ...
customer_reviews.text: The headset is absolutely great, the headset is comfortable to wear and the surround sound is highly effective when gaming and the Razer program that it comes with is very good for adjusting specific features of the headset. The headset is so simple to install and is literally plug and play so didn't take long to install and setup.
customer_reviews.author: Dhanikk

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: It's a good headset while it works, this headset lated about a year and a half, as good as the sound is I cannot say it is worth it for 1 1/2 years
customer_reviews.author: S_666

customer_reviews.title: Bassy but painful
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for headphones with brilliant bass these are the ones, although if you want to hear mid and highs for important in game noises Id say go elsewhere, also very uncomfortable after prolonged use.
customer_reviews.author: Reece Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Don't think too much, just go for it.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound! This is a must-have headset for gaming. It is very comfortable, it's cable is coated with textile and it has a mic that you can extend. It's LED lights change color constantly which gives it a cool look. The sound quality is just amazing. You can instantly understand where is the action around you 360. It also works seamlessly across the platforms. Even on Mac, it just works, all you have to do is plug in the usb. The boxing experience also proves that they care about the quality of their items. I suggest it 100%
customer_reviews.author: Metin Saray

customer_reviews.title: they sound ok for Music and great for gaming but after a period of time (about ...
customer_reviews.text: they sound ok for Music and great for gaming but after a period of time (about 2hrs) they really hurt my ears it's not just me my friend has got the same pair and they hurt his ears too. If you have small ears these are the headset for you. TBH if you're getting these for music please don't get the Audio-Technica ATH-M50X.
customer_reviews.author: Charley M

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would buy again
customer_reviews.text: So, not so funny story: someone in the apartment unit above us got STABBED. According to the cop who interviewed us, the attacker rang the upstairs doorbell, and when the guy answered the attacker, forced his way in and stabbed the guy. You want to know the scary part? I did not hear a thing, thanks to my amazing Razer Kraken 7.1 Chroma Gaming headset I got on amazon for £59.99 (free shipping)! These work as advertised. Probably the best headset I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed Alfalasi

customer_reviews.title: Amazing gaming headset
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic audio, fantastic microphone. The quality of my video stream on twitch is much improved since switching to this. It's also comfortable to wear, and as I already had Razer Naga and BlackWidow, I'm now a full Razer convert. I especially love that the microphone can be pushed into the headset when I don't need it, so I can get it out of the way. I did a lot of research before deciding on this headset and I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: T. J. Lau

customer_reviews.title: Big ears!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent headset. Bought for my son...and he can't praise the quality enough
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Well in general I love Razer products and I love the durable woven fabric ...
customer_reviews.text: Well in general I love Razer products and I love the durable woven fabric leads they put on their products. But it was a design fault to put one on these head phones because the small amount of friction it has with your clothes on the shoulder is amplified in the earpiece and is very off putting until your brain starts filtering it out after a week or so. Alternatively I guess you could play naked.
customer_reviews.author: Sanctus

customer_reviews.title: Really good Razer headphones
customer_reviews.text: Really good Razer headphones. The bass management is brilliant and good working condition, mic works perfectly with skype and other softwares with little to none problems encountered. 7.1 Surround sound is really good and separates the voices and sound effects to each corner where the sound should come from. I didn't even need to calibrate the headphones and the sounds seemed perfect. This test was done without any enhancements enabled other than stereo enhancement which generally just increases the frequency range the headphones should pick up. Pretty cool, happy and satisfied, definitely recommended to anyone who's looking for a long-term gaming headset.
customer_reviews.author: Rampartzz

customer_reviews.title: Honest review
customer_reviews.text: At the start of getting this item I asked for a refund because the microphone seemed to be cutting off and was really quiet, but after speculation and further insight into the product I saw you had to change the setting yourself, that's the only reason I won't give it 5/5 however the microphone is amazing, doesn't pick up other noise etc the 7.1 headphones are insane and they're quite comfy too!
customer_reviews.author: alex james

customer_reviews.title: Great quality headset!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent design with build quality to back it up. This is a very good gaming headset but does have a couple of drawbacks: - Faint static sound (I get none of this on the Razer Adaro Wireless). - Can get a little uncomfortable after a few hours. - Fairly awkward to set up using Razer Synapse (software used to customise the look and the sound quality of the headset) Despite this, it does have a lot of good things about it: - Great quality sound for both PC gaming and watching videos. - The Chroma lights are really cool! - Good sound-cancelling. - Fantastic surround sound (using Razer Synapse to calibrate it).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good. But get the v2
customer_reviews.text: Good product however a few things that are irritating such as the braided cable rubbing on clothes and making a noise and the body squeaking. Apart from that all good.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Razer is Razer
customer_reviews.text: this headset is a beast....it has the best mic ever i have ever used and the sound quality is amazing...good for gaming because of the 7.1 thing and believe me it really makes a great difference in fps games as you can hear the foorsteps i.e from which side the opponents are coming ..m loving it sooo far...highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Amit Dadwal

customer_reviews.title: 1 Chroma - They are very comfortable, they seem to leave me without 'headphone hair' ...
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased: Krakken 7.1 Chroma - They are very comfortable, they seem to leave me without 'headphone hair' which is a plus because I often switch from gaming to work, and so on. The only quarrel I have had with them is that they are extremely loud by default, but that was handled when I installed and configured synapse (Great App).
customer_reviews.author: Allen Boyland

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Amazing to use. Colours are awesome but not essential since you don't actually see them unless you take them off. Software to tune your headphones ensure the best calibration, and the levels of bass are immense. They are also collapsible so it makes them more portable too. Great value and an excellent choice for anyone who is looking to spend a little more for aural pleasure :D
customer_reviews.author: CZX

customer_reviews.text: Awesome sound quality from this beast, the only flaw i can immediately tell you is that the microphone being a 3.5mm jack connection is VERY bad. You will sound like a robot/staticly person. Very clear though so id suggest pairing this headshot with a USB sound-card adaptor. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jordan W

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality construction.
customer_reviews.text: This headset is now 6 months old and already the plastic strips that holds one of the earpieces to the overhead strap is splitting. Not good durability at all, so anything else like sound quality is irrelevant. I would not buy this headset again.
customer_reviews.author: xbritsinusa

customer_reviews.title: ... find I can't argue with the price - another good product delivered by the quality Razer brand
customer_reviews.text: It's definitely not the cheapest - but again I find I can't argue with the price - another good product delivered by the quality Razer brand. Seduced by packaging and holistic approach to gaming experience. Son delighted with his use of his family's generous Christmas money donations.
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: an absolutely AMAZING pair of headphones for the price, would sincerally recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: vercorock

customer_reviews.title: Well they look good.
customer_reviews.text: All I can hear is the cable rubbing up and down my clothes, the noise travels all the way to the headphones and its incredibly distracting. Invest your money into something better.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Mann

customer_reviews.title: Great quality fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son's xmas box..he says razor is the best headset available..sound and microphone excellent quality
customer_reviews.author: The mad cook

customer_reviews.title: ... rather embarrassing for a company that can produce really nice hardware. the razer kraken gaming headset for the ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is rather embarrassing for a company that can produce really nice hardware. the razer kraken gaming headset for the xbox one is just flimsy sound quality isnt too great for the price. the headset gets really uncomfortable after a hour of playtime. The only thing i like about it is the packaging. For any gamer looking for a decent headset to use across all platforms i would recommend : HyperX Cloud II (just a recommendation)
customer_reviews.author: Kieran R.

customer_reviews.title: Bass, Reverberation, and static noise issues
customer_reviews.text: The bass was way too loud and there was some kind of reverberation effect. The razer synapse app does have a few settings on this but it did not seem to solve the issue for me (note: you might be able to). Additionally, there is a faint static noise a few seconds after there is no sound playing, sometimes it would not go away after removing the USB; I switched USB slots but the problem continued. The headset is also unsuitable for those with big heads. The quality of the microphone is also relatively low. Since then I have replaced them with Sennheiser Game One and I could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: i would strongly recommend any buyers to look for another headset there are ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the third time i have had a problem with this brand of headphones. Both times on the headphones has stopped playing sound, i would strongly recommend any buyers to look for another headset there are much better headphones for the same price
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: First headset I have not broke after half a year. Very durable even when one end of the cable is completely bent the other way long term. The sound is amazing! If you have not had a decent headset before you are in for a treat when you get this. The 7.1 surround works brilliantly, would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Radford

customer_reviews.title: Great headset. To make it clear though, the 7.1 surround only works on a PC or a Mac
customer_reviews.text: Great headset, quality of sound fantastic. To make it clear though, the 7.1 only works on a PC or a Mac (though El Capitan seems to have problems at mo). On a console they only work in stereo. Didn't work at all on my Xbox 360 but fine on PS4 though just stereo. Thus 4 stars as description should have been clearer
customer_reviews.author: Shed

customer_reviews.title: Just amazing. A must buy if your looking for a quality pair and performance.
customer_reviews.text: For the past two years Ive owned three different pairs Tritton headsets. I'll admit they we're pretty good...bit expensive but they we're good. Nothing compared to a pair of these bad boys thpugh. The only problem I had with all three headsets was the headband...cracks would start to form but after almost a week of usage the Kraken 7.1 chroma stayed in tacked and maintained its original form after sitting multiple hours on my head while play games at home or listening to music at college. Overall i think that the Razer Kraken 7.1 chroma's are Beautiful designed with outstanding sound and mic quality I will definitely rate this a 5/5.
customer_reviews.author: hunter slewa

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My son uses these for his PS4 - he is very impressed with the sound quality and they look like they might last a bit monger than his previous 100 pairs of headphones!!!
customer_reviews.author: Twiggy

customer_reviews.title: This is easily the best headset I've had
customer_reviews.text: This is easily the best headset I've had. It's comfortable, the audio quality of both the mic and headphones is fantastic. The software that comes with it offers fantastic features, such as an equaliser that honestly, once put into Jazz mode makes music sound near perfect. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this the ear part is a bit uncomfortable at the moment. I think this is because they are new. Overall very pleased and good price
customer_reviews.author: ali lambert

customer_reviews.title: ... for well over a year now and it is fantastic. Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Been using this headset for well over a year now and it is fantastic. Super comfortable, solid build quality (all my other would have broken by now. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Good for right price
customer_reviews.text: Good headset for right price.works very well the sound is fairly good .but these are a midrange product not top range .build quality is ok but not great.buy these 50 to 60 pounds or less good buy but for 100 pounds these are not great value.i have 90 pound corsair voids for my pc they are far superior.i use my krakens for Xbox one and they are good so all in fairly pleased with them
customer_reviews.author: Porky99

customer_reviews.title: Lower sound quality than it should be and it had hairs from previous owner!
customer_reviews.text: I have an exact copy of this product (just that the microphone was broken) and for some weird reason the sound quality of these ones is not as good. Also on top of that found some hairs and was sent with no box at all!
customer_reviews.author: Miquel

customer_reviews.title: great quality sound not had the chance to try the ...
customer_reviews.text: great quality sound not had the chance to try the mic, the box is like any other Razer packaging the only thing that i have a problem with is that they aren't quite as comfortable as the Chimaera headset (also they aren't uncomfortable) but they definitely make up for that with the sound quality
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchases back in September and has now broken in less than a year. Sound coming through all crackly and robot like. Don’t waste your money!!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Bacon

customer_reviews.title: Ive wanted some good gaming headphones for some time and finally found something ...
customer_reviews.text: Ive wanted some good gaming headphones for some time and finally found something worth the money. Very comfortable and do not make your ears hurt like other headphones, due to great padding around the ear pieces. Great quality sound when playing and even when I am listening to music. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid 4/5 short cable let it go down and van get abit sweaty in summer.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality sound and the headset itself, Very comfortable for long term gaming I wear them a maximum for 8hrs on weekends and have no pain what do ever, can get quitehot with all that padding In the summer however so do mind that also the cable is quite short if your trying to use it for console gaming sitting on a sofa that's more than 2 meters I would advise a extension cord.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Lasts just until past the warranty period so not really a very good product. No info on repairs available on website and just might as well buy another cheaper brand if I'm going have to buy one just every 1-2 years. What a total joke
customer_reviews.author: Elnas

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy Overall!
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this headset as a whole! Great for Gaming and looks amazing. However I wouldn't recommend it if your wanting a non gaming exclusive headset because the bass is just to powerful. some people may like that but sometimes i find it a little annoying. Still overall a great headset.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Rowan

customer_reviews.title: only lasted a year
customer_reviews.text: 2nd pair. first one lasted a year and same with the second
customer_reviews.author: Gisele

customer_reviews.title: Makes like a hissing sound
customer_reviews.text: Makes like a hissing sound, I do not expect a headset worth £70 to do such noise. I have requested a refund for this and bought a pair of Steelseries Siberia v200.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headset
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this over a wireless turtle beach for my ps4 and pc. It was worth it because it allows you to hear every tiny piece of sound that goes on in the game. For example on call of duty you can hear your opponents clearly and it allows you to hear if they are to the right or left to you so helps with gameplay. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kat Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable with amazing sound and microphone quality
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the money. Very comfortable with amazing sound and microphone quality. The cable system is nice as it allows the headset to be used like a normal pair of headphones as well.
customer_reviews.author: Seth's mum

customer_reviews.title: A really great headset; providing a full 7
customer_reviews.text: A really great headset; providing a full 7.1 surround sound; making it that much easier to figure out where the enemy is coming from in CS:GO! Also comes with a very good quality microphone, and a range of colours to chose for the LED lighting to the sides of the headphones!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: however the sound on this is very very dull, everything seems far away
customer_reviews.text: The microphone on this headset is OK, no complains there, however the sound on this is very very dull, everything seems far away, because of this the surround sound is lacking. I suppose the price makes this this head set OK, but it just doesn't cut it for me , so I shall be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Yaroslav

customer_reviews.title: ... comes in a decent box and the headset is nice and well fitting
customer_reviews.text: When you first get this item it comes in a decent box and the headset is nice and well fitting. BUT OHHHH NO NO MIC!!! well i thought that but if you look to the side a square is sticking out just pull it and the mic comes out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking headphones
customer_reviews.text: Love these. They light up in all different colours and the surround sound is awesome. Only issue is the cable makes lots of noise in the headphones when it rubs against your clothes
customer_reviews.author: K. P. Londors

customer_reviews.title: Beast of a headsets no comparison
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best headsets ive ever owned just at 50% sound its blowing my ears the surround is superb and the bass is perfeeect finishing touches with the rgb lighting is purfect <3
customer_reviews.author: Asfand

customer_reviews.title: Good Overall, ( Lasted 1 Year 4 Months ) However Poor quality headband - Snaps Easily.
customer_reviews.text: Firstly to start off this headset is a great headset, other than a few things. The sound is great, its comfortable and it comes with a adaptor too, however the band going over your head is very poor quality and snaps easily ( i managed to super glue it) but after 1 year and 4 months of use the sound has cut out on one side of the headset which i cant stand, so therefore i have had to purchase a new one ( not this headset ), unfortunately i hope that it lasts longer than that and therefore have given this headset a 2 star.
customer_reviews.author: South Devon Hedgehog Hospital

customer_reviews.title: It's awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Razer Kraken Pro is a fantastic headset that offers superior comfort over its competition. If you need a great PC headset at a fair price that you can wear for a long periods of time, the Kraken Pro is a fantastic option. Designed simply, conveniently and affordably for your life and your wallet. It offers some great convenient features for long term use and gaming needs. While it may not offer some of the bells and whistles of a wireless headset it will provide you with hours of gaming entertainment. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Dawid

customer_reviews.title: Very good headset
customer_reviews.text: Great sound- nice style comfy and very imersfull i love the fact you can edit bass ect on razor snypas and also change the RGB lighting
customer_reviews.author: jamal

customer_reviews.title: Great and a bargain for the price paid for
customer_reviews.text: Surround sound is amazing helpful when playing video games that rely on survival and these help you hear every little sound from footsteps to locating where shots are being made. From feedback off of players in game the mic is spot on and very clear and to top it off the chroma lighting is very appealing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic quality and a good buy
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these earphones - they serm to be permanently attached to his head!!! Fantastic quality and a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: c d blackburn

customer_reviews.title: ... are incredible the boosted bass really adds to the excellent sound quality and the microphone works even better than ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality and the feel for the headphones are incredible the boosted bass really adds to the excellent sound quality and the microphone works even better than Razer said it would. I would highly recommend the headphones, they really are the ultimate gaming experience
customer_reviews.author: Tony S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome headphones
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are amazing. I would recommend these to anyone they are so comfortable and the sound is amazing. They also work on my Xbox One with a headset adapter on my controller
customer_reviews.author: Cordless Human

customer_reviews.title: fit on my big head fine. and a little tricky to set up mic ...
customer_reviews.text: fit on my big head fine. and a little tricky to set up mic where it only pick up my voice while my mate either on his phone or talking to me.
customer_reviews.author: george

customer_reviews.title: ... them still getting used to them but they are great though one problem is a hissing sound when any ...
customer_reviews.text: Got them a few days ago and loving them still getting used to them but they are great though one problem is a hissing sound when any volume is being used this a rare occurance and is easy to ignore when playing a game
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent USB headphones
customer_reviews.text: Solid quality. Good sound quality. Nice calibration and set up tool. Probably the highest quality headset I have owned. A little on the pricey side and you may be able to get as good for slightly less, but you won't be disappointed with these.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Not for the big earred
customer_reviews.text: Lovely designed and packaged and a pleasure to look at but unfortunately after a few hours this headsets tends to start to hurt my ears Not sure if its my big ears or whether its the headset itself but il be looking to purchase a different one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can become uncomfortable after prolonged... I'm talking ...
customer_reviews.text: Can become uncomfortable after prolonged...I'm talking hours. (Shouldn't really be using headphones for hours anyway so it's probably with any headphone).
customer_reviews.author: Briggy

customer_reviews.title: Best headset yet (for me)
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, (got it on sale), mic is amazing with great 7.1 surround. Chroma just adds style to it. Very comfortable I hard;y know its there. Then again its Razer after all
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Q. De Candolle

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Decent headphones but can get better ones for the price
customer_reviews.author: J George

customer_reviews.title: Great Effects & Music - Bad Commentary & Communication
customer_reviews.text: Overall sound effects and music is really good. What let this product down is that if you listen to any sort of commentary over game play or even speak to your friends. They always sound flat or sound like they're speaking from inside a tin can. This is even with Razer Synapse and Surround sound pro.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong product, still works
customer_reviews.text: Bought damaged for a concernable discount, and they sent me the wrong one's, but still working perfectly and have stood up to a year of use.
customer_reviews.author: LuciferW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Mu boyfriend loved it , sound quality is bery good the cable is not too long not too Short just enough . He just uses them for gaming and he doesnt want to take them off ^^ most likely will get a different colour for my self
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made, in my opinion it could benefit from ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully made, in my opinion it could benefit from a little more padding across the top of your head to make for comfortable, but then I am bald so have no natural padding!
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Very good.
customer_reviews.text: Surround sound is Perfect, extremely good for fps gamers , can't see how u can get better especially for the price. Unbelievable for listening too music too, very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's great if you have the LEDs turned off
customer_reviews.text: It's great if you have the LEDs turned off. Sound quality is fine, microphone quality is kinda shoddy but audible and clear enough. But the Chroma LEDs cause a whining hiss in the earpieces, particularly when cycling through green colours.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan W.

customer_reviews.title: sound quality is not that good, software is annoying to use
customer_reviews.text: sound quality is not that good, software is annoying to use. mic has a metallic sound no volume adjuster good quality build but not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: [...] I made an unboxing and review of this product to express all of my opinions, but the short response is I really like this piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Gen

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sound Quailty is good, however the sound drivers cut out rather frequently.
customer_reviews.author: thomas ireland

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones, worth the price tag.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic sound, does feel a little tight fitting after wearing it for a while but is still very comfortable. Mic has great clarity.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Pimley

customer_reviews.title: Great Headset
customer_reviews.text: Over 2yrs later and lots of use, still work like day 1...highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Glen Dunne

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound quality, great Bass and mid tone and look good too
customer_reviews.author: Nemo UK

customer_reviews.title: Great if you are into Razer and want a razer headset
customer_reviews.text: really comfy, sound quality is amazing it has great bass and with synapses you can boost it, feels well built and fits well with my black widow Chroma keyboard and my 2012 Naga mouse, my only complaint is how far the mic comes out and how flexible it is.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is such a fun and enjoyable product which has appealed to many of my needs. I underestimated the capabilities of this product and am surprised yet delighted with the outcome of such an affordable product.
customer_reviews.author: MikeH

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: 3 times had to send back due to microphone stopping working.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs H.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cash
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, worthy of those who are picky about clarity and range. Works well with a Macbook and is good for voice recognition/dictation software ( works with dragon dictate). For the price it's a good bit of kit. The earpieces are comfortable if a little small, and it does not isolate external sound as effectively as some cheaper brands. The braided cable is like a ticking clock... Only annoying when you become aware of it. So when immersed in music or game it's not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: These were good quality surround sound headphones
customer_reviews.text: These were good quality surround sound headphones, however I have bought Seinheissers since then which are not only cheaper, but massively outperform these.
customer_reviews.author: Richard M

customer_reviews.title: At first the headset was one of the best I had ever used
customer_reviews.text: At first the headset was one of the best I had ever used. However after 3 months the wire has broke and now I can only hear out of 1 ear cup. The return window was only 1 month after purchase of a £100 order. Not really worth it in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Keene

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great headset for sound wh*ring your opponents. Had it for a year now.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Sterry

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This headset is amazing! Sound quality very clear (default mic volume is quite loud though, had to adjust it down quite a lot), fits very comfortably and doesn't feel too heavy or uncomfortable after wearing them for a few hours. Glowing / changing lights on the cups are a cool touch.
customer_reviews.author: Meeria

customer_reviews.title: Sent them back.
customer_reviews.text: Too tight and very uncomfortable. the cups sits on your ears and not comfortable wearing them for long hours. The sound quality is okay. if you really want razer kracken get the V2 as they are a bit bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Xtreme TT

product_meta.title: Razer RZ04-01380200-R3M1 Kraken Pro 2015 Analog Gaming Headset for PC and PS4 - Black, Green
product_meta.description:
Style Name:40 mm Drivers| Colour Name:Black, GreenOne of the world's preferred eSports headset. Now with an in-line remote. Introducing the Razer Kraken Pro, a gaming headset fully focused on ergonomics for the head. Weight, functionality and performance were the key variables identified and ideally balanced for a comfortable gaming headset.

BOX CONTAINS
Razer Kraken Pro - Analog Gaming Headset;Quick start guide;Razer Sticker;Confirmation of Razer (Razer Certificate);3.5mm Y-cable splitter
feature_bullets: The Razer Kraken Pro, one of the popular eSports gaming headset is compatible with PC and PlayStation 4 Gaming Headset
Elegant Razer form factor with an ideal balance of weight, functionality and performance; game all-night long with plush comfort and optimised weight for extended wear
Rapidly adjust volume or mute with in-line controls; one headset for gaming and mobile devices with a 3.5 mm audio jack and included splitter cable
Immersive gaming and music audio with large 40 mm neodymium magnetic drivers tuned for clear high and mid-ranges as well as deep powerful bass
Fully retractable microphone boom pulls out from the ear cup when you need it, always in an ideal spot whether you are giving strategic commands or making a quick call to your friends

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars1,505 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
